mapper.select: SELECT pa.attname AS columnName, pt.typname AS dataType, -- concat_ws ( '', pt.typname, SUBSTRING ( format_type ( pa.atttypid, pa.atttypmod ) FROM '\(.*\)' ) ) AS dataType, pd.description AS columnComment FROM pg_class AS pc INNER JOIN pg_attribute AS pa ON pa.attrelid = pc.oid INNER JOIN pg_type AS pt ON pa.atttypid = pt.oid LEFT JOIN pg_description AS pd ON pd.objoid = pa.attrelid AND pd.objsubid = pa.attnum WHERE pc.relname = #{tableName} AND pa.attnum > 0 ORDER BY pc.relname DESC, pa.attnum ASC
